sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: The HDFS to HPCC Connector provides a means to import data from Hadoop's HDFS into an HPCC Systems Thor platform. It also supports exporting the data back to HDFS or exporting and merging it. This allows you to use an HPCC cluster in conjunction with your Hadoop-based cluster.
The H2H Connector is an add-on to an HPCC Cluster and consists of server-side components and ECL Macros that invoke them.

listitem.para: The H2H Connector assumes that you installed Hadoop with a standard installation package, either Hadoop 1.x or later using the rpm or deb installer. If you have installed Hadoop manually there may be some additional configuration required.
Imports data from Hadoop's file system (HDFS) to a Thor Cluster.
Exports data from a Thor Cluster to Hadoop's file system (HDFS).
Exports data from a Thor Cluster to Hadoop's file system (HDFS) and merges the data.
